topics.body:
okay so I've been playing the attack on titan game for under 3 hours and I've already beaten four of the five campagins. Plus a lot of the campaigns recycle missions from the other campaigns
I mean it's really fun but unless the "world mode" has a considerable amount of content I don't think this was really worth 40 bucks. 30 maybe, 20 ideally. 

still, it's a good fucking around game. you know, just something to kill some time without much commitment .

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/555809856368726ce0d12600#post_555809856368726ce0d12600
[bq="uc9"]"@HJSDGCE":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/555808266368726ce0902400#post_555808266368726ce0902400
[bq="HJSDGCE"]!http://i0.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/774/659/42a.png![/bq]
It's kind of funny actually how much little kids play online 18+ video games; I mean it's to the point we have lego Halo characters and that.[/bq]
Same could be said for Pokemon games.
I guess it's due to this mentality of kids having a desire to do what the "grown ups" do. And adults wanting to "relive their childhoods".
